title.en: Isekai de Aisare Sugite Komattemasu! Isekai BL Anthology

altTitles.ja: 異世界で愛されすぎて困ってます！異世界BLアンソロジー

altTitles.en: I'm in Trouble Because I'm Loved So Much in This Different World! Isekai BL Anthology

description.en:
Despite being a misanthropic mage!?? Despite being the best friend of the fallen prince!?? Despite being the villainous son!?? To be adored by the cheat protagonist in another world! The popular BL novel from 'Moonlight Novels' is now in comic form! An otherworldly BL anthology!!

Cover art: Yamamori Potato

**Contents:**
1. "A Deliberate Mage Is Doted Upon by a Holy Knight in a Peaceful World" (陰キャな魔導士は、平和な世界で聖騎士に溺愛される). Art by Yamamori Potato, Story by Ei Enroku. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9423ic/)
Shun is reincarnated as a mage in another world. Carrying over his distrust of humans from his past life, he gradually opens his heart as he is adored by the holy knight, Sasha.
2. "I've Been Reincarnated as the Best Friend of the Prince of Darkness" (闇堕ち王子の親友に転生してしまいました). Art by Korotora, Story by Tachibasami. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2944id/)
The protagonist is reincarnated as the best friend of the 'prince of darkness' in the RPG world he loved in his previous life. As he tries everything to avoid the prince's fall into darkness, changes start to appear in the prince's demeanor...?
3. "I Was Reincarnated as a Dog, but I'm Still Doing Well" (犬に転生したけど今日も元気です). Art by Mochita, Story by ◇◆◇◆. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n8433hw/)
Reincarnated as a dog, I was picked up by a handsome prince. The prince adores my fluffy fur, but it turns out I was a beastman...?
4. "The Villainess Only Wanted to Be Betrothed to the Prince at Any Cost, and That Was All" (その悪役令息は、なんとしても王子と婚約したかっただけなのです。ただそれだけだったのです。). Art by Bandou, Story by Tentsubu. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1713hw/)
Daen, who was mocked for his ignorance, volunteered to be the prince's fiancé. However, he finds himself being looked at affectionately by Rintz, who should be his rival for the engagement...?!
5. "Even If I'm Reincarnated, I Want to Love Shiba Inu!" (転生しても柴犬を愛でたい！). Art by Yoshizuka Mayako, Story by Yoshihisa Shiba. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n4281ic/)
Vilfred, who loves Shiba Inus, finds himself in an otherworld where only Prince Ferdinand owns a Shiba Inu... He has no choice but to get closer to the prince!!
description.ja:
人間不信の魔導士なのに！？ 
闇堕ち王子の親友なのに！？ 
悪役令息なのに！？ 
異世界のチート攻めから溺愛されるなんて！ 

『ムーンライトノベルズ』の大人気BL小説をコミカライズ！異世界BLアンソロジー！！ 

カバーイラスト：山森ぽてと

**第1巻の内容：**
1. 『陰キャな魔導士は、平和な世界で聖騎士に溺愛される』　漫画：山森ぽてと　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9423ic/)：栄円ろく
魔導士として異世界に転生したシュン。前世での人間不信を引きずっていたが、聖騎士サーシャに溺愛されるうち次第に心を開いてきて──。

2. 『闇堕ち王子の親友に転生してしまいました』　漫画：コロ虎　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2944id/)：タチバサミ
前世でハマったRPGの世界で「闇堕ち王子」の親友に転生した主人公。闇堕ち回避のために手を尽くしていると王子の様子に変化が…? 

3. 『犬に転生したけど今日も元気です』　漫画：もちた　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n8433hw/)：◇◆◇◆
犬に転生した俺はイケメンの王子に拾われた。王子は俺のもふもふを溺愛してくるのだが、どうやら俺、獣人だったみたい…？ 

4. 『その悪役令息は、なんとしても王子と婚約したかっただけなのです。ただそれだけだったのです。』　漫画：ばんどう　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1713hw/)：てんつぶ
身の程知らずと罵られながらも王子の婚約者に立候補したダエン。なのに婚約者候補のライバルであるはずのリンツから愛おしそうに見られて…!? 

5. 『転生しても柴犬を愛でたい！』　漫画：よしづかまやこ　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n4281ic/)：斯波良久
柴犬が大好きなヴィルフレード。しかし転生した異世界では、柴犬を飼っているのはフェルディナンド王子しかおらず...これは王子様とお近づきになるしかないっ！！

title.en: Mob kara Hajimaru Tansaku Eiyuutan

altTitles.ja: モブから始まる探索英雄譚

altTitles.zh-hk: 從路人開始的探索英雄譚

altTitles.zh: 从路人开始的探索英雄谭

altTitles.en: The Story of an Exploration Hero Who Has Worked His Way up From Common People

description.en:
Takagi Kaito, a low status high schooler, your typical mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. 

One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. 

Rise above being just a mob explorer Kaito! A modern battle fantasy story has begun!

---

[Web Novel (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8930fk/) 
[Alternative Raw (Niconico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55183)
description.ja: ＜ダンジョン＞にソロで潜り、スライム狩りの毎日を送る男子高校生・高木海斗。そんなある日、変なスライムから時価10億の<サーバントカード>を手に入れる。悩み抜いた末に召喚を選択した海斗のもとに現れたのは神話の戦乙女ヴァルキリーの格好をした幼女シルフィーだった。一度は落胆したものの、シルフィーが最強クラスのスキルを持っている事が判明し…!? モブな探索者から成り上がれ!
description.pt-br: Takagi Kaito, um colegial de baixa estatura, o típico personagem Mob, era um explorador comum que caçava slimes todos os dias nas masmorras que surgiram no Japão, ganhando dinheiro extra enquanto admirava sua amiga de infância, a madona da classe. Um belo dia, um slime dourado que ele nunca tinha visto antes aparece para ele. Depois de derrotá-lo, ele obtém um item extremamente raro no valor de centenas de milhões, uma carta de Servo que pode convocar seres lendários!! Depois que ele se decide, ele a convoca, e uma donzela guerreira extremamente linda aparece. Supere sua posição como um simples Mob, Kaito! Uma nova fantasia moderna começa!

title.en: Sugar Meets Girl!

altTitles.ja: しゅがー・みーつ・がーる！

description.en:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?
description.es: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?
description.es-la: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?

title.en: Kimi wa Yotsuba no Clover

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

title.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en:
She's cute! She's beautiful! She's sexy! She... speaks in tongues? Meet the Brainrot Girlfriend! She means well, but good luck understanding what she says. 
Brainrot translation: shes skibidi shes toilet shes roblox she girl math goat bussing this better caul saul mrbeast metal pipe falling the roblox amogus she gigachad glazer but colleen ballinger nonchalant poppy playtime what she roblox L rn
description.tl: Ang cute niya! Ang ganda niya! Ang seksi niya! At siya ay... nagsasalita ng iba't ibang wika? Sa Vietnamese na manga na ito, kilalanin ang Jowang utakbulok! Mabuti ang kanyang intensyon, pero swerte na lang kung maiintindihan mo ang sinasabi niya.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

title.en: Little Mushroom

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

title.en: Fukuzatsu na Kyoudai no 4koma

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma
The Person I Met In-Game Was Actually My Big Sister

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

title.en: Nito no Joreishi

altTitles.ja: 二兎の除霊師

description.en: Gotsuji and Uruka, two exorcists, spend their days hunting down and banishing "evil spirits." Their mission is to track down and slay a specific malevolent spirit. At the heart of this quest lies Gotsuji's deep, unresolved grief and vengeance for a woman who died long ago. While Gotsuji is consumed by a thirst for revenge, Uruka, who struggles to understand this obsession, faithfully stays by his side. Together, these two exorcists are bound on a journey, but where will it lead?
description.ja: 除霊師の五辻とうるかは依頼を受けて"悪霊"を祓う毎日を送っていた。彼らの目的は、ある悪霊を捜し出して斬ること。そこにはかつて死んだ女性に対する、五辻の強い想いと弔意があった――。 仇討ちに執着する五辻と、それを理解できないながら伴走するうるか。ふたりの除霊師の旅の行きつく先とは…？ バニーと和装で霊を殺（ト）れ！

title.en: Yumizuka Iroha wa Tejun ga Daiji!

altTitles.en: Technique is Everything to Yumizuka Iroha!
The Process is Important for Iroha Yumizuka
Yumizuka Iroha's No Good Without Her Procedure!

altTitles.ja: 弓塚いろはは手順が大事！

altTitles.zh: 弓塚同学今天也依旧脱靶

description.en: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!

title.en: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: ハズレ判定から始まったチート魔術士生活

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

altTitles.en: Life as a Cheat Magician that began with a False Judgment

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.



The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！

title.en: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I Don't Want to Raise a Child With You Anymore

altTitles.zh: 闭嘴恶龙我不想再跟你带孩子了

altTitles.en: Shut Up, Malevolent Dragon! I Don’t Want to Have Any More Children With You

altTitles.uk: Помовч, зла драконихо! Я не буду виховувати з тобою дітей!

altTitles.zh-ro: Bizui Elong Wo Bu Xiang Zai Gen Ni Dai Haizi Le

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...
description.uk:
Після поразки та полону, вбивця драконів Леон потрапив у полон до королеви клану Срібних Драконів. Усвідомлюючи наближення смерті, він використав заборонену техніку, щоб накласти прокляття на королеву, але несподівано королева втратила контроль.

Він думав, що це змусить королеву жити з соромом до кінця життя, і це буде гідно титулу вбивці драконів.

Але через два роки, коли Леон розплющив очі, поруч з ним сиділа дівчинка-дракон із хвостиком...

title.en: Tensei ni Hakobijin no Isekai Kouryakuhou

altTitles.ja: 転生荷運び人の異世界攻略法

altTitles.en: A Reincarnated Carrier's Strategy for Another World
The Way To Conquer A Different World As A Reincarnated Porter

altTitles.id: Strategi Menghadapi Dunia Lain oleh Seorang Carrier yang Bereinkarnasi

altTitles.vi: Người vận chuyển dị thế giới

description.en: A man who yearns for freedom is reincarnated and he chooses the undesirable job "Carrier"--The fastest way to conquer both women and other world with wisdom and courage!
description.ja: 戦闘力がほとんどなく最弱といわれるが、固有スキルとして収納スキルを持つジョブ「荷運び人」。セイは、転生にあたり多数の選択肢から、そんな「荷運び人」を選ぶ。その理由は、たくさんのアイテムを不自由なく持って、ひとりで気ままに世界を旅したいからというものだった。そんなセイが出会ったのは、純粋で無垢な僧侶・ルナミリア。危なっかしいルナミリアを放っておけず、セイは成り行きでパーティーを組むことになる。

title.en: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.ja: 与えられたスキルを使って稼いで異世界美女達とイチャイチャしたい

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menggunakan Keterampilan Yang Diberikan Untuk Mendapatkan Uang Dan Menggoda Wanita Cantik Dari Dunia Lain

altTitles.ja-ro: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.en: I Want to Use the Skills Given to Earn Money and Flirt With Beauties From Other Worlds

description.en: That day, Ishida Yamada was working part-time as usual. When he opened the back door after finishing his part-time job, he found a blank space and a person who called himself God. It was by chance that he was chosen by God to go to another world. He was perplexed, but decided to live anyway. Thinking about how to survive in this other world using the skills he received from God, he tries his best to have a physical relationship with a beautiful woman in this other world.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.

title.en: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

description.en: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as "witches."
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

title.en: Nano List

description.en:
Milo lives in a world where interacting with androids is completely normal. And now, he lives with TWO androids built by his sister. How safe is he living with androids who have deadly strength? Why did his sister gift him a "bodyguard android?" Well, he's about to find out the hard way.  
Source: Webtoon
description.pl: Pewnego dnia przybył prezent urodzinowy od mojej zmarłej siostry …

title.en: Prey

description.en: Park Yun-yeong has a mysterious power which allows her to see ghastly creatures that seem to inhabit our world but not interact with it - unless they notice you acknowledge their existence. That’s when they stop being harmless.
description.pt-br: Park Yun-yeong tem um poder misterioso que permite que ela veja criaturas horríveis que parecem habitar nosso mundo, mas sem interagir com ele, a menos que percebam que você sabe que eles existem. É nesse momento que eles deixam de ser inofensivos.

title.en: Vampire Princess Miyu: Saku

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔
吸血姫美夕 朔

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

title.en: D•N•Angel•

altTitles.en: ディー・エヌ・エンジェル

description.en: Daisuke Niwa is an ordinary, if slightly unlucky, middle school student. On his fourteenth birthday, he comes down with a 'condition' that has plagued the men in his family for three hundred years. When he sees his crush, Risa, he transforms into his alter ego, the phantom thief Dark Mousy. Unfortunately, when Dark Mousy sees his crush, Risa's twin Riku, he transforms back into Daisuke. The only cure for this craziness is if Daisuke can get Risa to fall in love with him…

title.en: Mayonaka Heart Tune

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転生したらあかりだけスライムだった件

altTitles.en: That Time Only Akari Got Reincarnated as a Slime

description.en: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world… and Akari turns into a slime. A new Yuru Yuri isekai spinoff.

title.en: We Are Not Dating!!

altTitles.vi: Tụi mình không có hẹn hò

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”
description.pt-br:
"Por que você continua perguntando se estamos namorando? Só estamos de mãos dadas, não estamos namorando!!"
É uma comédia romântica slice-of-life sobre casais que não são realmente casais!

title.en: Saint Seiya - Rerise of Poseidon

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢 海皇再起 RERISE OF POSEIDON

altTitles.pt-br: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco - O Retorno de Poseidon

altTitles.ja-ro: Saint Seiya: Kaiou Saiki RERISE OF POSEIDON

description.en:
The sanctuary is exhausted after the battle against the Lord of Darkness Hades.
In the absence of Seiya and the others, the land was about to meet its end in the wrath of the goddess Nemesis!
At that moment, the Emperor of the Sea Poseidon awakens to Hades' call and, together with the Seven Marina Generals challenges Nemesis and their Heroic Souls who serve her in battle!
description.es:
El santuario está agotado tras la batalla contra el Señor de la Oscuridad Hades.
En ausencia de Seiya y los demás, ¡la tierra estaba a punto de encontrar su fin en la ira de la diosa Némesis!
¡En ese momento, el Emperador del Mar Poseidón despierta a la llamada de Hades y, junto con los Siete Generales del Mar, desafía a Némesis y a las Almas Heroicas que le sirven en la batalla!
description.ja:
冥王ハーデスとの闘いで疲弊した聖域。
星矢たちも不在でという中で、女神ネメシスの怒りにふれ地上は破滅の時を迎えようとしていた！
その時、ハーデスの呼びかけで覚醒した海皇ポセイドンは、七人の海将軍と共に、ネメシスとそれに仕える英魂士に戦いを挑む！
description.es-la:
El santuario está agotado tras la batalla contra el Señor de la Oscuridad Hades.
En ausencia de Seiya y los demás, ¡la tierra estaba a punto de encontrar su fin en la ira de la diosa Némesis!
¡En ese momento, el Emperador del Mar Poseidón despierta a la llamada de Hades y, junto con los Siete Generales del Mar, desafía a Némesis y a las Almas Heroicas que le sirven en la batalla!

altTitles.ja: かわいい後輩に言わされたい

altTitles.en: I Want to be Teased by a Cute Junior

altTitles.zh-hk: 可愛後輩想讓我說出口

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero ser provocado por uma kouhai fofa

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.ja: まったく素直じゃない後輩・守山ちゃんは、自分にアプローチさせようと野洲先輩を挑発したり、時には大胆にアクションしたり…!?
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.

title.en: Blue Box

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: Densetsu no Otokonoko Mokkori Haishinsha

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

title.en: I Will Rewrite the Dead End Novel

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Rewrite the Devastating Novel

description.en:
[Let's get rid of this psychopath before that]

Yes, I possessed someone.

But who I was in my previous life.
I can't remember at all.

All I remember is,
just this guy's face that filled my eyes.

The day I woke up for the first time as a wizard's experiment,
we were together.

Strangely enough, about my previous life,
this guy seems to know better about it than I do.

In a dead-end novel,
you are the only one you can trust and rely on...

In order to live,
I have to run away from this guy.

In the future, he will kill the female lead's entire family.
It's because he's a psychopath whose view on the world is final darkness.

After a while...

Finally, out of his grasp,
I thought I could live a peaceful life─

"You cruelly abandoned me."

This guy, he finally found me.

"Did you enjoy playing with me?"

Now, he can't even be compared to his past self.
He went completely mad.
description.ko:
[그 전에 이 사이코패스부터 치워버리고요]

그래, 빙의했다.

그런데 내가 전생에 누구였는지
도무지 기억이 나지 않는다. 

기억나는 것이라고는,
눈 앞을 가득 채우던 이 녀석의 얼굴뿐.

마법사의 실험체로서 처음으로 눈 뜬 그 날
우린 함께 태어났다.

이상하게도 내 전생에 대해
나보다도 더 잘 알고 있는 것 같은 이녀석.

이 막장의 끝을 달리는 피폐한 소설 속에서
유일하게 믿고 의지할 수 있는 존재여야하건만…

살기 위해서는,
이놈에게서 도망쳐야 한다.

장차 여자주인공의 가족을 모두 살해하고
세계관 최종 흑막에 등극하는 사이코패스니까. 

시간이 흐른 뒤…

마침내 녀석의 손아귀에 벗어나
평화로운 일상을 맞이하나 싶었는데─

"너는 잔인하게 날 버리고 떠났지."

기어코 나를 찾아내고 말았다, 이 녀석은. 

"날 가지고 노는 동안 즐거웠나?"

그것도 과거와 비교도 안될 만큼
단단히 미쳐버린 채로.

title.en: I Can't Fall in Love With Paperman

altTitles.zh: 我不可能和纸片人谈恋爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Bu Keneng He Zhi Pian Ren Tan Lian'ai

description.en: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao, she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck, will she surrender or resist? What's worse, the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: Houkai Gakuen 4-Koma

description.en: 4-koma based on the mobile game Guns Girl Z (Houkai Gakuen / Houkai Gakuen 2).

title.en: Childcare Diary With the Villain

altTitles.es-la: El diario de crianza con el Villano

description.en: Mary didn’t know what to expect of the afterlife, but it certainly wasn’t becoming the evil, murderous nanny of the novel she was reading. Her circumstances become secondary concerns when she realizes that no matter what, Briel must remain safe. It’s the only way to keep his uncle, Count Kentryle Chalant, from the path of revenge. Can she keep her new charge safe and change the entire plot, or will the true villain get the best of them all? And is she going to find love on the way?

title.en: Boku wa Ayashii Kimi no Mono

altTitles.ja: 僕は妖しいキミのもの

description.en: Shou-chan is a member of the public morals committee who wants everyone to have a healthy relationship, and is worried about his childhood friend Sayo. Because she carries the blood of a succubus, she often approaches her beloved her Shou-chan in any way to make him "lovey-dovey sex". As he persists in having a healthy relationship, which is full of lust and surrounded by questionable students, will Shou-chan manage to keep his sanity?
description.ja: どんな相手とも「正しい関係」でありたい風紀委員・しょうちゃんは、幼なじみの紗夜に悩んでいた。淫魔の血を引く彼女は、「ラブラブえっち♡」をすべく、あの手この手で大好きなしょうちゃんにアプローチ。紗夜を筆頭に、「正しくない関係」を望む妖しい生徒たちに囲まれて、しょうちゃんは正しさを守りきれるのか！？
description.es-la: Shou-chan es un miembro del comité de moral pública que quiere que todo el mundo tenga una relación sana, y está preocupado por su amiga de la infancia, Sayo. Debido a que ella lleva la sangre de un súcubo, a menudo se acerca a su amado Shou-chan, de cualquier manera para darle “sexo amoroso y alegre”. Mientras él se empeña en tener una relación sana, la cual está llena de lujuria y rodeada de estudiantes cuestionables, ¿logrará Shou-chan mantener su cordura?

title.en: Aitsu no Kanojo

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

title.en: Jashinkankin Harem de Isekai seifuku!

altTitles.ja: 邪神監禁ハーレムで異世界征服！

altTitles.zh: 监禁邪神用后宫征服异世界

description.en: A chaotic, different world ruled by evil gods. The main character, Yuya, wakes up to the sound of a girl's voice calling his name. It is a temple of desire ruled by the evil god Liv where numerous people were immersed in pleasure like crazy. Even in the midst of all this, Yuya still maintains his rationality. Liv shows her interest and ties him up with special chains. However, the chain was originally a weapon that deprived evil of their powers by imprisoning and subjugating them. Due to the revelation of the old god Agnes, who resides in the chains, Yuya uses his power to imprison dangerous evil gods one after another.
description.ja:
邪神たちに支配された混沌の異世界――。
主人公・ユウヤは、自分の名前を呼ぶ少女の声とともに目覚める。
そこは邪神リヴが支配する欲望の神殿で、
大勢の人々が狂ったように快楽を貪っていた。

そんな中でも理性を保ったままのユウヤに、
リヴは興味を示し、特別な鎖で縛りあげる。
しかしその鎖こそは、本来邪神を戒めるための道具であり、
監禁・屈服させることで邪神のスキルを奪う武器だったのだ。

鎖に宿る旧神アグネスの「王座におつきなさい」との啓示により、
ユウヤはその力を使い、危険な邪神たちを次々と監禁していく…。

冴えない男の異世界監禁×逆襲エロファンタジー、開幕！

title.en: Kono Sekai wa Fukanzen Sugiru

altTitles.ja: この世界は不完全すぎる

description.en: Haga is one of the debuggers that gets stuck in the world of an incomplete VR game. Though he eradicates a monster from a village, the destruction event that ends with the villagers' deaths triggers without fail. However, Nicola, the villager girl he saves, revives before his eyes.
description.ja: 極秘に組織された調査隊「王の探索者」（キングス・シーカー）の一員である主人公・ハガ。この世のあらゆる事象を調べ、王命を受け旅をする探索者は村人からも尊敬されていた。任務の一環でドラゴンの襲撃から村を守ることに成功するハガ。成り行きで助けた少女・ニコラと世界を探検することになるが、ハガの真の目的は冒険ではなく…。
description.pt-br: O protagonista Haga é um membro da equipe de investigação secreta chamada "Os Buscadores do Rei" (Kings Seekers). Os exploradores, que investigam todos os fenômenos deste mundo e viajam sob ordens do rei, são respeitados pelos habitantes das aldeias. Haga consegue proteger uma vila do ataque de um dragão como parte de uma missão. Por acaso, ele acaba ajudando uma garota chamada Nicola e começa a explorar o mundo com ela. No entanto, o verdadeiro objetivo de Haga não é a aventura…

title.en: Isekai Saikou no Kizoku, Harem wo Fuyasu Hodo Tsuyoku Naru

altTitles.ja: 異世界最高の貴族、ハーレムを増やすほど強くなる

altTitles.en: The Best Noble In Another World: The Bigger My Harem Gets, The Stronger I Become

description.en:
Yuuto is suddenly reincarnated into the other world in a smartphone game and becomes the third son of a noble family. “Skills” exist in that world, and Yuuto was reincarnated with “Noblesse oblige.” When Yuuto, who has become an adult, embraces a woman as a ceremony, “Noblesse oblige” is activated. That is a rare skill, the skill that lets him copy the skills of the woman he embraces!

Yuuto embraces women possessing skills one after another, becoming the strongest with the skills he acquires, and building a harem of women who fall in love with him. Furthermore, it was discovered that “Noblesse oblige” can awaken skills and evolve skills, and the cheating keeps on coming! All the women and skills I want are mine! The strongest cheat harem begins here!
description.ja: ノブレスオブリージュという言葉と謎の光に導かれ異世界に転生した男がいた。それから17年。成人の儀を迎えた貴族の三男・ユウト＝ムスクーリは掟に従い初めて（17年ぶり）女を抱くことになったのだが――！
description.pt-br: Yuuto reencarna em outro mundo e se torna o terceiro filho de uma família nobre. “Habilidades” existem neste mundo e Yuuto reencarnou com a habilidade “Noblesse oblige”. Quando Yuuto abraça uma mulher através de uma cerimônia, “Noblesse oblige” é ativado. Esta é uma habilidade rara, a habilidade que lhe permite copiar as habilidades da mulher que ele abraçar! Yuuto abraça as mulheres que possuem habilidades uma após a outra, tornando-se mais forte com as habilidades que adquire e construindo um harém de mulheres que se apaixonam por ele. Além disso, “Noblesse oblige” pode despertar outras habilidades e construir habilidades. Todas as mulheres e habilidades que eu quero são minhas! O harém trapaceiro mais forte começa aqui!

title.en: Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta!

altTitles.ja-ro: Yasei no Rasu Bosu ga Arawareta!

altTitles.ja: 野生のラスボスが現れた！

altTitles.en: Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta!: Kokuyoku no Haou

description.en:
It was in the year 2800 of the Midgard calendar. Back then, there was a Overlord who once reigned supreme and had reached the very brink of subduing the world. Her name was Lufasu Mafaalu, a great woman dreaded as the Black-Winged Overlord. She was too strong, too fast, and too beautiful. However, she was defeated by Heroes who opposed her ferocity, and her ambition was brought to an end.  
  
Or so went the story of our protagonist’s in-game character, whose body he now possesses for some reason in a world 200 years after Lufasu’s downfall. Follow our protagonist as he becomes unnecessarily feared by his surroundings and unnecessarily worshiped by his former subordinates as he―or now she―cheerfully travels around this fantasy world.
description.ja: 時はミズガルズ暦2800年。かつて覇を唱え、世界を征服する寸前まで至った覇王がいた。名をルファス・マファール。“黒翼の覇王”と恐れられる女傑である。彼女はあまりに強く、あまりに速く、そしてあまりに美しく……。しかしルファスは、その猛威に立ち向かった勇者達に討たれ、その野望に終止符が打たれた。 ――という設定のゲームのマイキャラ（♀）に、何故か憑依してしまった俺（♂）。これは周囲に必要以上に怯えられたり、元部下に必要以上に崇拝されたりしながら、ルファス（中身は俺♂）が異世界を旅するお話である。
description.ru: Был 2800 год по календарю Мидгарда. В те времена жила одна Повелительница, которая царствовала над всем миром, покорив его до самых границ. Имя ей было Люфас Мафаал, великая женщина, которую боялись как Тёмнокрылую Владычицу. Она была слишком сильна, быстра и невероятно красива… Однако, её победили Герои, восставшие против её жестокости, и её амбициям пришел конец… Вернее такой была история игрового персонажа, чьё тело наш главный герой получил по некоторым причинам в мире спустя 200 лет после свержения Люфас. И с этого начинается история увлекательного путешествия по фэнтезийному миру нашего главного героя, или вернее сказать, героини.

title.en: I Became the Only Healer in This World

altTitles.ru: Я стала единственным хилером в этом мире

altTitles.ja: この世界で唯一のヒーラーになりました

description.en:
Healer who is addicted to gambling has been on a single path for years. Somehow, the world changed and I became the world's only healer. [There is a place that needs you, a unique healer.] [Will you respond to the summons?] ‘What? 'You have a tank dealer but no healer?' No, what. Is there any balance for X network with tank damage but no healer? [The constellations watching you complain that this is not a game, but reality!] *** It has been several decades since the Gate appeared. I heard that a lot of strategies and data have been accumulated over the years. ‘Why is everyone proceeding so inefficiently? 'Frustrating?' I was serious about my strategy, so I just tried my best to close the gate. “It was you who saved me. “I made it so that only you can see it.” 1st place in the former rankings who were said to have been betrayed and went into hiding. “I need you. my savior “My life.” Head of the world's top 10 guild unions. “Don’t abandon me. Because I can’t breathe without you.” Up to 1st place in the current ranking. I was too busy clearing the gate, but strange guys started to come by. 

[Plate/Constellation/Hunter/Himsumjin/Munchkin/Yeojuwon Tower/Salvation]
description.ru:
Девушка, играющая за хилера на протяжении многих лет, так и не смогла ничего достичь. Однажды, невероятным образом она переместилась в другой мир, в котором не оказалось ни одного хилера.  
— Есть пати, которое хочет пригласить вас, невероятного и неповторимого хилера. Вы ответите на призыв?  
"А? У них есть танки и ДД, но ни одного хилера? У них тут вообще хоть что-то сбалансированно?"  — 
Это не игра, а реальность. И созвездия, защищающие тебя, будут жаловаться тебе на жизнь!    

***  
Врата появились несколько десятилетий назад. За это время накопилось множество тактик и сведений, но...  
— Что за унылые атаки в лоб? Ещё не надоело?  
Из-за очень наивной тактики врата брали напролом.  
— Это вы ведь меня спасли? Лишь благодаря вашим способностями.  
Преданный, скрывающийся бывший первый ранг...  
— О, моя спасительница, не покидай меня.  
...директор ассоциации 10 гильдий...  
— Прошу, не бросай меня. Я не смогу жить без тебя.  
...и даже нынешний первый ранг — каждый был восхищен ею.  
Когда она была занята тактикой прохождения врат, начали появляться странные дети, что совершенно не входило в её планы.

title.en: 100-man no Inochi no Ue ni Ore wa Tatteiru

altTitles.ja: 100万の命の上に俺は立っている

altTitles.en: I'm Standing on a Million Lives

altTitles.ko: 나는 100만 명의 목숨 위에 서 있다

altTitles.fr: Je me tiens au-dessus d'1 millions de vie

altTitles.id: Aku berdiri di atas sejuta nyawa

altTitles.it: Sono in cima a un milione di vite

altTitles.es: Estoy parado sobre un millón de vidas

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đang Đứng Trên Một Triệu Sinh Mệnh
Ta Lập Tại Bách Vạn Sinh Mệnh Chi Thượng

description.en:
Yotsuya Yuusuke along with his classmates Shindou Iu and Hakozaki Kusue have been transported to a strange and unknown world inhabited by mythological creatures. As soon as they arrive, they meet somebody calling himself the Game Master who then grants them a time-limited quest. To aid them in this quest, he also bestows Shindou and Hakozaki with the roles of a Magician and a Warrior while Yotsuya is randomly granted the role of… a Farmer?!  
This is how a hectic life of adventuring began for three students who now have no choice, but to complete random quests for several phases in the fantasy world if they want to stay alive and protect the real world from the demons and monsters they encounter.

---

**Note: All chapters are now available with official English simulpub from K-Manga!**

---
- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I%27m_Standing_on_a_Million_Lives)
description.ja: 合理的で友達もつくらない帰宅部の中学3年生、四谷友助。そんな彼が、唐突に異世界に飛ばされ、同級生の女の子2人と力を合わせて戦う羽目に。単独行動大好き、独自の視点でマイペース道を行く四谷は、主人公としてどうなのか──!!?

title.en: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

altTitles.ja-ro: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

title.en: Dangerous Lover

description.en:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

title.en: Minigram (MILGRAM 4koma)

description.en: The day-to-day lives of the prisoners and guards of the Milgram Prison! But in a funny 4-Koma form!
description.es: ¡El día a día de los prisioneros de Milgram! Un 4koma cómico
description.es-la: ¡El día a día de los prisioneros de Milgram! Un 4koma cómico

title.en: Ikitsuku Saki wa Yuusha ka Maou ka

altTitles.ja: 行き着く先は勇者か魔王か　元・廃プレイヤーが征く異世界攻略記

altTitles.en: Is the destination a hero or a demon king?

description.en:
“I’ve found you!”

Mamiya Yuuto was transported into another world after hearing those words, but all he got out of it were a younger body and the ability to see his status screen at any time — in overwhelming detail.

Survive in a different world with skills and magic, armed with the experience of working life and the knowledge and perseverance of a retired gamer!

title.en: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.ja: 前世は剣帝。今生クズ王子

altTitles.ja-ro: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.zh-hk: 前世是劍帝。今生是渣王子

altTitles.pt-br: Na Minha Vida Anterior Eu Era o Imperador da Espada. Nesta vida sou um Príncipe Lixo.

altTitles.en: Sword Emperor previous life, Prince Trash this life.
Previous Life was Sword Emperor. This Life is Trash Prince.

description.en:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
description.ja: 世間に悪名轟く「クズ王子」ファイ。その前世は「剣帝」と呼ばれた男だった。頑なに剣から距離を置き、グータラ三昧の日々を過ごすファイだったが、隣国でのある出会いをきっかけに、運命の歯車が動き出す。
description.pt-br: A espada, vivia pela espada e morria pela espada. Depois de dias e meses de batalha, o espadachim escolheu a morte por sua própria vontade, mas renasceu como Fai Hanse Diestburg, o terceiro príncipe do reino de Diestburg. Querendo se distanciar de sua vida passada, onde vivia como possuído pela espada, Fai decidiu levar uma vida perdulária, ganhando o apelido de “Príncipe Lixo”. No entanto, um dia, devido a um trato com a casa real de Afillis, o reino vizinho, Fai é enviado para a guerra, liderando tropas de reforço. No campo de batalha, Fai testemunha uma cena de desespero quando o “Herói”, uma existência com poder rivalizando com dezenas de milhares, varre o campo de batalha. Fai considerou retornar ao reino, mas a morte de um certo cavaleiro conseguiu abalar seu coração, então ele decidiu empunhar a espada mais uma vez – a lenda do príncipe preguiçoso mais forte começa!

title.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? II

altTitles.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? II

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka 2

altTitles.ru: Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье? 2

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうかⅡ

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka II

description.en: Adventurer Bell Cranell's life changed forever when he met the goddess Hestia, becoming the first member of her familia. Since then, he’s gone on many adventures, growing much stronger in the process. But when he steps foot into Orario’s pleasure quarter, where Ishtar Familia reigns supreme, he soon finds himself in way over his head... With enemies all around him, he’ll need the help of a beautiful, fox-eared courtesan if he’s to have any hope of making it back home!
description.ru: Огромный город Орарио - всего лишь вход в подземный лабиринт, широко известный как "Подземелье". Люди приходят туда за славой, честью, приходят, надеясь получить все то, что захотят. И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя. Продолжение "Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье?" от Оомори Фуджино с новым художником Ямачи Тайсей.

title.en: Ijousha no Ai

altTitles.ja: 異常者の愛

description.en: The demon in human form. An innocent girl sacrificed. Kazumi Ichinose. 16 years old. high school student. Midou Saki fell in love with him when he was an elementary school student. That was the beginning of hell. Jealousy. Obsession. Pools of Blood. Tears. Death. Common sense, words, nothing makes sense. Misfortune befell those loved by "him". Love starts with blood. This is the beginning.
description.pt: O demônio em forma humana. Uma garota inocente foi sacrificada. Kazumi Ichinose. 16 anos Estudante do ensino médio. Midou Saki se apaixonou por ele quando ele era um estudante do ensino fundamental. Esse foi o começo do inferno. Ciúmes. Obsessão. Poças de sangue. Lágrimas. Morte. Senso comum, palavras, nada faz sentido. A desgraça caiu sobre aquelas amadas por "ele". O amor começa com sangue. Este é o começo.

title.en: Makyou Seikatsu: Gakeppuchi Boukensha ga Hikikomoru ni wa Hirosugiru

altTitles.ja: 魔境生活 〜崖っぷち冒険者が引きこもるには広すぎる〜

description.en:
After being expelled from his family home, our main character tries his hand at becoming an adventurer, only to find out that things aren't quite as they seem. Determined to change his fate, and with the money he's saved up, he heads out to purchase a plot of land in the remote, unexplored wilderness, with the intent of forging his perfect new life. Little does he know, this expanse is infamous as the 'Demonic Realm,' a treacherous territory brimming with savage plants and creatures!

But navigating the daily trials of this life-threatening wilderness may prove be a challenge. In his journey of growth, an array of inhabitants, each driven by their motives, decide to follow him, bringing vibrancy back into his life. However, unseen powers resolute in preventing the Demonic Realm from being conquered begin to surface... Will he be able to endure, triumph, and make this land his new home?
description.ja:
実家を追い出されて冒険者になるも、堕落の一途を辿る主人公の青年。このままでは駄目だと一念発起した彼は、超辺境にある土地を購入して理想の住み処を作ろうとする。しかしその土地は『魔境』と呼ばれる、凶暴な動植物がうごめく超危険地帯であった！
日々命がけのサバイバルを生き抜き、徐々に逞しくなってゆく青年。そんな彼のもとに訳アリな住人たちも集まり生活が賑やかになるが、魔境を放っておかない勢力も現れて……！？

title.en: Uragirareta Boukensha, Andeddo Toshite Yomigaeri Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: アンデッド・キング 〜底辺冒険者、魔物の力で進化無双〜

altTitles.en: Undead King ~A Low-Ranking Adventurer, With the Power of Monsters, Becomes Unbeatable~

altTitles.ja: 裏切られた冒険者、アンデッドとして蘇り無双する

description.en:
(skills). A power humans can only receive once from god, which is used to fight against monsters.
Chrome, who aspired to be an adventurer while owning a skill that is useless in combat, is unable to throw away his ambition, and is despised for his inability, so he is left in charge of menial tasks and chores for his career.
But, when he is running away from a monster as a decoy, he loses his life. But at that time, his skill activates. The skill (Revival). For one time only, he can come back from the dead, and Chrome miraculously revives as a Skeleton monster, a “Wight”.
Chrome, who despairs at his new body, finds out that as monsters evolve, their appearance changes in accordance, so he decides to evolve as fast as possible. Believing he can regain his human appearance, Chrome spends his days hunting monsters. As a by-product, Chrome gains a multitude of skills, whereas a human can only ever hold one––!
Powerful monster abilities and the intelligence of a human. Overcoming adversity with chance, Chrome once again aims to be the strongest adventurer!

title.en: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya

altTitles.en: Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!

altTitles.es-la: La madre demonio indefensa frente a la lindura de su hijo

altTitles.zh: 儿子可爱过头的魔族母亲

altTitles.ja: 息子がかわいくて仕方がない魔族の母親

altTitles.ko: 아들이 귀여워서 어쩔 수 없는 마족엄마

altTitles.tr: Oğlunun Tatlılığına Karşı Koyamayan Bir Şeytan Anne

description.en:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
description.tr: Bir iblisin kötü günlerini arkada bırakarak, anne olma yolundaki adımlarını anlatan sevimli bir seri.
description.pt-br:
Lorem, uma demônio infame e temível, teve que se estabelecer por causa de Gospel, seu filho. Embora não pareça, ela é uma mãe amorosa e zelosa, mas permanece temível tanto para os companheiros demônios quanto para os espectadores humanos, porque mantém a terrível reputação de sua juventude selvagem e terrível dos anos anteriores.

Pelo bem do amor maternal, ela tem que perseverar, aprender e prosperar num mundo onde não está sozinha. Pelo bem do Evangelho e do seu futuro.

Sinta o Amor nele!
